name: Hail The Queen
description:
**Description**

When someone threatens the Queen's life, you need to think fast! Command Lord Minds and other combatants to stand your ground. All orders must go through Lords before arriving at the ears of your minions so don't waste any second!

**Controls**

Scroll your view left and right with the arrow keys(or A and D)

Select Lord Minds using the number keys

Command Lord Minds to move with a click

'C' to snap the camera to selected Mind Lord

**Creatures**

Beeg Slugg - Queen
Tall Lad - Lord Mind
Crab - Warrior
Skittish Little Bastard - Minion

Art by Mosaic Mind and Baby Wolf
Code by RomeoSierra and Zippo
Music by Da.Video
